title: J&J Live show from Detroit!
description:
What a weekend for J&J - first to Ann Arbor to watch the Wolverines roll over Sparty, then to Ford Field with a live show with none other than Barry Friggin' Sanders, then they watched the Pistons shoot down the reigning champion Warriors with Steph Curry and Jalen talking trash all night. Yeah, we'll still break down the Bills big win, the Lakers first win, and more -- but this pod is all about the EXCLUSIVE Live Show, done in front of a real audience for the first time in years -- which is we are delivering only for the pod fam. Pull up. (And Boss Up.)
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
